Trade/Device Name(s): Glucose Meter-Check Control Solution for NIPRO TRUEresult
Glucose Meter-Check Control Solutions level 1&2 for TRUEresult Glucose Monitoring System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Glucose Meter-Check Control Solution for NIPRO TRUEresult, a glucose control solution for verifying performance of TRUEresult Glucose Test Systems
Indications for Use Summary: Intended to verify the performance and correct operation of the NIPRO TRUEresult Glucose Test Systems; for use by healthcare professionals and people with diabetes mellitus at home
